raw_body:
DIAS BANDARANAYAKE – MANTHRI,​ Wife of late Lakshman,​ mother of Niran,​ sister of Sunethra,​ aunt of Veveika and Bishani,​ Janitha and Mahesha. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from Saturday 9.00 a.m. onwards. Burial on Sunday 28th January at 11.00 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Kanatte (Anglican Section).
006357
